game.name: DCS: F-16C First in Weasels Over Syria Campaign by Ground Pounder Sims
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Strap on the mighty F-16C Viper and enter the world of the Wild Weasels! First In - Weasels Over Syria will immerse you in this legendary mission as you fly head on into the enemies air defenses.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Strap on the mighty F-16C Viper and enter the world of the Wild Weasels! First In - Weasels Over Syria will immerse you in this legendary mission as you fly head on into the enemies air defenses.
game.developers: Eagle Dynamics SA, Ground Pounder Sims
